page.title: 03"THE NEWS"
page.content: The News formerly the"Evening News" was established in 1877, increasing sales immensely.The Head Office at City Centre where" The News" and weekly papers are published including large numbers of publications for other companies. The News Centre is one of the most advanced papers in Europe with word processors and colour used in publica- tions of the 100,000 copies a day. There are staff based at the news centre and at 12 branch offices.The executive editor has overall control of what stories are to be covered. Final decisions are made by the news editor who reports them himself. The most frequent stories are on crime, the Council,,courts,education, sport,the community and famous people.
